adpara_txt: We were a batch of 33 students and every student had different plans for themselves some went abroad, some stayed here for higher studies and some got placed from the campus and also through their outside sources. But overall, the placements for undergrads were not as good as placements for Master's students. For us many companies came such as decathlon who took 2 students, Axis Bank, kpmg
eve_text: Recently, 6+ students form BMU got package of 26 + LPA in 2022 from 3rd year Batch. Vice chancellor of BML Munjal University congrats and awarded.
